a:t.name: Description
a:t.value:
Test Using Algorithm
WHO standard testing strategy for HIV-1 diagnosis (among people ≥18 months of age) HIV.B7 Test for HIV using testing algorithm, HIV.C4 Test for HIV using testing algorithm, HIV.D.11 Retest using HIV strategy

def.name: Should Continue with Performing HIV Assay 2
Should Continue with Performing HIV Assay 1 repeated
